INSERT INTO t_sys_menu (menu_name, pid, url, menu_type, status, icon, description, operator, sort, create_date) VALUES (#{menuName}, #{pid}, #{url}, #{menuType}, #{status}, #{icon}, #{description}, #{operator}, #{sort}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT id, menu_name, pid, url, menu_type, status, icon, sort, create_date, update_date, description, operator FROM t_sys_menu WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT_WS('',menu_name,description) LIKE #{searchKey} ORDER BY pid ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_menu SET menu_name=#{menuName}, pid=#{pid}, url=#{url}, menu_type=#{menuType}, status=#{status}, icon=#{icon}, sort=#{sort}, description=#{description}, operator=#{operator}, update_date=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, menu_name, pid, url, menu_type, status, icon, sort, create_date, update_date, description, operator FROM t_sys_menu WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT menu.id, menu.menu_name, menu.pid, menu.url, menu.menu_type, menu.status, menu.icon, menu.sort, menu.create_date, menu.update_date, menu.description, menu.operator FROM t_sys_menu menu LEFT JOIN t_sys_menu_role_relation menurole ON menurole.menu_id=menu.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_role tuserrole ON tuserrole.role_id=menurole.role_id WHERE 1=1 AND status='NORMAL' AND tuserrole.user_id=#{userId} AND menu.pid=0 AND menu.pid=#{parentId} GROUP BY menu.id ORDER BY menu.sort ASC

SELECT menu.id, menu.menu_name, menu.pid, menu.url, menu.menu_type, menu.status, menu.icon, menu.sort, menu.create_date, menu.update_date, menu.description, menu.operator FROM t_sys_menu menu LEFT JOIN t_sys_menu_role_relation menurole ON menurole.menu_id=menu.id WHERE 1=1 AND status='NORMAL' AND menurole.role_id=#{roleId} AND menu.pid=0 AND menu.pid=#{parentId} GROUP BY menu.id ORDER BY menu.sort ASC
